[lesser alchemist's fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75) (3), [Backpack](/Equipment.aspx?ID=4), [Bedroll](/Equipment.aspx?ID=7), [Explorer's Clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=2), [Compass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=16), [Flint and Steel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=21), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=76) (20 arrows), [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31), [Rations](/Equipment.aspx?ID=40) (1 week), [Rope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=44) (50 feet), [torches](/Equipment.aspx?ID=60) (3), [Waterskin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=62), [woodworker's artisan tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=59), basic woodworker's book

---

<actions string="Single Action" />

**Class Abilities**   Hunt Prey, Hunter's Edge ([precision](/HuntersEdge.aspx?ID=2))
